description:
0|1 is a small "puzzle" game where you move a cursor around over some nodes and turn them from 0s to 1s. Use the arrow keys to move the cursor, R to reset. The game doesn't have an explicit win state (mostly due to me being too lazy to figure out how to implement one). so just assume you've won when all 0s have turned into 1s.

Made for LOWREZJAM 2022.
